title: How to Change the Default Search Engine in Yandex Browser (PC)

steps.title: Open Yandex Browser on your PC.
steps.content: Open Yandex Browser on your PC. It's a round icon portraying a red coloured "Y" logo in the white background. If you don't have Yandex Browser on your computer, go to browser.yandex.com and download and install the app.

steps.title: Open the Settings page.
steps.content: Open the Settings page. To do that, click on the menu icon ( â‰¡ ) at the top right of the page and select Settings from the options.

steps.title: Navigate to the "Search" section.
steps.content: Navigate to the "Search" section. Scroll down to "Search" and click on the box, below the Set which search engine to use for SmartBox text.

steps.title: Select a search engine.
steps.content: Select a search engine. Click on your favourite search engine from the list to make it default. You can add new search engines from the Manage search engines option. Finished!
